name: Tetris 2012 Unity
description:
Yet one more Tetris. Just For Fun. A Unity port of Tetris 2012.

Controls F1  Help W / Up Rotate the figure A / Left Move the figure left D / Right Move the figure right S / Down Move the figure down Space Drop the figure T Turn on/off sound H Turn on/off the figure helper F12 Take a screenshot Scoring 1 line 10 x level 2 lines 25 x level 3 lines 50 x level 4 lines 100 x level
